text: Ventura (officially the City of San Buenaventura; commonly called San Buenaventura before 1891),Erwin G. Gudde, California Place Names: The Origin and Etymology of Current Geographical Names, 4th ed., rev. and enlarged by William Bright (University of California Press, 1998), p. 410. or Shisholop in Chumash is the county seat of Ventura County, California, United States. It was incorporated in 1866. The population was 110,763 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Ventura County, California Category:County seats in California Category:1866 establishments in California
title: Ventura, California
